top.title: Putin and Trump's envoy set for key Ukraine talks in Moscow
top.summary: Steve Witkoff will hold talks at the Kremlin, after the White House said it was "optimistic" about a breakthrough.

top.title: Appeals court disqualifies ex-Trump lawyer Alina Habba as New Jersey prosecutor
top.summary: An appeals court disqualified Alina Habba, Trump's former personal attorney, from serving as US Attorney for New Jersey.

top.title: Honduras presidential candidates locked in 'technical tie', official says
top.summary: Right-wing candidate Nasry Asfura leads former TV host Salvador Nasralla by just 515 votes, according to country's electoral authority.

top.title: Jorja Smith's record label hits out at 'AI clone' song
top.summary: The label claims Haven's dance hit I Run was made using AI trained on the award-winning singer's voice.

top.title: Virgin Media fined £24m for leaving vulnerable customers 'at risk of harm'
top.summary: Ofcom has fined Virgin Media after an investigation found it had left thousands of vulnerable telecare customers at risk.

top.title: Barcelona distances itself from sponsor's cryptocurrency after backlash
top.summary: Experts say the deal may put fans at risk as the Catalan club tries to relieve its financial woes.
